export const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||"http://localhost:5000";export const ENDPOINTS={PRODUCTS:"/products",PRODUCT_DETAIL:"/products/:id",CART:"/cart",CHECKOUT:"/checkout",ORDERS:"/orders",CATEGORIES:"/categories",AUTH:"/auth",AUTH_ME:"/auth/me",AUTH_SIGNUP:"/auth/signup",AUTH_SIGNIN:"/auth/signin",WISHLIST:"/wishlist",PAYMENTS:"/payments",PAYMENTS_RAZORPAY:"/payments/razorpay",PAYMENTS_RAZORPAY_VERIFY:"/payments/razorpay/verify"};export const NAVIGATION_LINKS=[{label:"Home",href:"/"},{label:"Shop",href:"/shop"},{label:"About",href:"/#about"},{label:"Contact",href:"/#contact"}];// Helper function to build full API URLs
export const getApiUrl=endpoint=>{return"".concat(API_BASE_URL).concat(endpoint);};
